section.title: lcr.dump_gws
section.para: Dump the contents of lcr_gws table.

section.title: lcr.dump_rules
section.para: Dump the contents of the lcr_rules table.

section.title: lcr.defunct_gw
section.para: Defunct gateway until specified time (Unix timestamp).

section.title: lcr.load_gws
section.para: Load matching gateways and prints their ids in priority order. Mandatory parameters are lcr_id and uri_user followed by optional parameters caller_uri and request_uri. Error is reported if an lcr_rule with matching prefix and from_uri has non-null request_uri and request_uri parameter has not been given.
